fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
eu_initiatives:
The promotion of employee share ownership and participation 
CMU Action Plan 
Shareholders Rights Directive 
Corporate governance 
Europe 2020 
Single Market 
Small Business Act
organisation_name: European Federation of Employee Share Ownership (EFES)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: We are a partner member of the European Federation of Financial Services Users (Better Finance)
goals__remit: The EFES' objective is to act as the umbrella organization of employee owners, companies and all persons, trade unions, experts, researchers, institutions looking to promote employee share ownership and participation in Europe.
relevant_communication:
Internet site 
Monthly electronic newsletter 
Annual Economic Survey of Employee Ownership in European Countries 
Database of employee ownership in European companies 
Numerous studies and reports 
Annual European Meeting of Employee Ownership 
Conférences 
Lobbying to influence policymaking 
Contacts with Commissioners, EU civil servants, Members of the European Parliament (MEPs) to promote the development of employee ownership in Europe 
Participation to public consultations, public hearings or debates held by the EU institutions 
Management of EU-funded projects involving activities covered by the Register.
